lines.text:
[in response to an Italian man on the train asking what he does]
I fight against fascism. That is my trade.
I do what must be done. That is what I know how to do.
We've been shaken out of the magnolias.

[Addressing Anise and discussing her French accent]
Yes your accent is from the North, that is fine country. We were in hiding there once.

[Last Lines]
When the time comes. When it comes, I will do my best.
I do not tell you this story to prove that we are remarkable but to prove that they are not.
There is a great deal of gossip about both of you.
That never stopped anybody from gossiping.
Because it's Anise's birthday, I shall go and buy presents for everybody. We always do that here. It started because I don't like not getting presents on other people's birthday.
